Introduction to Explainable AI - 6th of Nov, 2019

Tags: event, announcement


Join us for an evening of Explainable AI!

Join us on the 6th of November for an Introduction to Explainable AI - Opening the black box!

From talking to people across different businesses for the last few months, we know that there is significant interest in ‚Äúexaplainble‚Äù AI models. The reason is natural: When we deploy these decision-making tools, we need to understand why they make decisions; as this helps us learn if they are doing the ‚Äúright‚Äù thing. And furthermore, it let‚Äôs us improve or adjust our processes.

Our intention is to give you a high-level overview, and cover one or two areas in some detail, so you can get a feel for what‚Äôs involved.

As such, we‚Äôve organised an event to explore the landscape of Explainable AI. In particular, we will:

  • Look at what‚Äôs available,
  • Work out what is involved in applying it,
  • and, Learn where the field is heading!

We‚Äôre bringing together a few people in Melbourne who are doing interesting work in this area!

After attending this event, you should be able to understand:

  • What is Explainable AI (XAI)?
  • Who is using it?
  • How well does it work?
  • What are the alternatives?
  • How can I get started?

So if you‚Äôve got an interest in using and building that AI is understandable, please join us!

The event is by donation only, and you can grab tickets over on Humanitix - Introduction to Explainable AI - Opening the black box!. All donations go to support education for girls.

We‚Äôll be running out of the awesome space at OC House in North Melbourne. There will be drinks, snacks, and plenty of time for mingling!
